dsense.name: further, also US: farther
dsense.guideword: mainly UK (comparative of far: more distant)

example.eg: How far is it? Is it further than that house over there?
example.egtrans: 离这儿有多远？比那边的房子离得更远吗？

example.eg: You should leave by the further door.  Comets act differently at the farther reaches of the solar system.
example.egtrans: 你应该从较远的那扇门离开。彗星在太阳系较远的地方有着不同的轨迹。

example.eg: I think he'll need further training.
example.egtrans: 我认为他还需要更进一步的训练。

example.eg: We'll need to get further staff to finish this project.  A further advantage of the new oven is that it is self-cleaning.
example.egtrans: 我们还需更多的员工来完成这个项目。这个新烤箱还有一个额外的优点——自我清洁。

example.eg: You need to walk further than that if you want some exercise.  She can throw a ball farther than her brother can.
example.egtrans: 如果你想达到锻炼的效果你就还得走得更远一些。她能比哥哥把球扔得更远。

example.eg: I'll investigate further and get back to you.
example.egtrans: 我会进行进一步调查，然后再给你答案。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 进一步地, 更大程度上地

example.eg: She's dedicated to furthering the cause of the homeless.
example.egtrans: 她致力于推进照顾无家可归者的事业。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 促进, 推动, 助长

example.eg: And, further, this isn't his first offence.
Springfield is far from here.
example.egtrans: 斯普林菲尔德离这儿很远。

example.eg: His beliefs put him on the far right of the political spectrum.
example.egtrans: 他的信念使他成为政治派别中的极右分子。

example.eg: She walked far this morning - almost ten kilometres.
example.egtrans: 今天早上她走了很远，几乎有10公里。

example.eg: Jim called to his kids at the far corner of the pool.
example.egtrans: 吉姆叫泳池远处的孩子们回来。

example.eg: She was far more likely to succeed than people thought.
example.egtrans: 她成功的可能性远比人们认为的高。

example.eg: She walked far away from him.
example.egtrans: 她走了开去，离他远远地。

example.eg: Parents can arrange a meeting with the school to discuss the matter further.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 进一步讨论, 深入讨论

dsense.name: down the line, further down the line
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (in the future) (非正式用语)

example.eg: Further action was needed to win the battle.
According to what it says further down, you don't need to do anything yet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 继续教育, 成人教育, 进修

example.eg: For further information click on the link above.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 更多信息，进一步的信息

example.eg: A little further on, past the church, you'll come to a roundabout.
Ten years further on, not much has changed.
Further to your enquiry, I can confirm that tickets are still available.
example.egtrans: 就您的问题，我可以确认，票尚未售空。

example.eg: The house we're looking for is further up the street.
This year the team went one step further and won both domestic cup competitions.
Look no further; I have exactly what you need.
The restaurant will be closed until further notice.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直至另行通知, 在另行通知前

dsense.name: without further ado, without any more ado

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不再等待, 不再拖延
不可拖延, 刻不容缓
